basics.name: Mark Nemec
basics.summary: I'm a student at the University of Edinburgh.

work.summary: I got into the internship programme in 2013 and was offered a part-time position for a year after that. I came back to intern next summer again.
highlights: Price parsing algorithm that can deal with most currencies and price formats
Wrote Python code for web-scraping framework
Worked with multiple web frameworks: Flask, Django, Angular

work.summary: I worked on an Android app called tourcentrope. The app is aimed on tourism on the borders of Slovakia, Czech Republic, Austria and Hungary. I worked on the whole app - from Software design to UI.
A website I created and designed about a mountain-biking project in Štiavnické Vrchy mountain range in Slovakia.

volunteer.summary: The aim of the project was to help upkeep buildings of various religions and meet people from different cultures.

awards.title: Netcraft Prize
awards.summary: The Netcraft Prizes are awarded to the 6 undergraduate students with best performance in third year.
